raw_body: GOMES – PEARL WINNIFRED. Beloved daughter of the late Lucas and Mary Josephine Gomes,​ sister of the late Anton,​ late Bernard,​ late Felix,​ late Rev. Fr. John,​ late Stanley,​ late Aloysius,​ late Annesley,​ and of Leslie and Patrick Gomes,​ passed away peacefully on 8th November 2023. Much loved sister-in-law,​ aunty,​ grand aunty and great-grand aunty to many. Remains will lie at Barney Raymonds Funeral Parlour in Borella on Sunday,​ November 12th from 9.00 a.m. to 2.00 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 2 p.m. on the same day,​ for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic section).072990
